text: @santiagomayer_ Pentagon must have hired Kanye for PR: “Imma get back to pandemic in a minute. But first we just wanna say that UFOs are real & they deserve more respect. Sure COVID-19 is big, but aliens have been around longer & are so much more creative than a virus.”
